review-changes.description: Required step after any change set: evaluate step-by-step instructions, perform peer review (e.g. cs-peer-reviewer-trustworthy-ai), attempt reproduction, and accept or reject the premise. Never use synthetic/mock/dummy data; use hypothesis + experiment + evidence instead.
steps: Evaluate the step-by-step instructions that were followed
Perform peer review of the changes
Attempt to reproduce the results (re-run tests, re-fetch data, re-build)
Accept premise if reproduction succeeds and no synthetic/mock/dummy data; otherwise reject and revert or rewrite
